summary: Cable discusses Antonio Cuesta, an associate of Mrs. Geddes, who is a former crewmember of the Tejana III and a friend of AMDENIM-1. Cuesta is making inquiries about a boat and may return to PBRUMEN soon. The cable also mentions George Hopping as a reliable source of information.
title: DIR INFO WAVE CITE BARR 0134 JMZIP KUSODA KUDESK
